name: Game And Walk: The Mall Simulator
name_original: Game And Walk: The Mall Simulator
description:
Game and Walk is an anime inspired infinite runner that takes place in an endless mall. Do your best to dodge school girls, overweight otakus, shopping spree ladies, and dreadful kiosks in this highly intensive action packed mall simulator!

FEATURES:
- Dodge with lightning fast reflexes
- Dress yourself up in colorful outfits
- Obliterate mall traffic with weird spells
- Upgrades to make your next 'walk' much easier
- Achievements cause everyone likes those
